name: Marik
title: the Wise
abilityWindow: After a player discards an action card other than “Sabotage”:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow a different player to spend 3 influence to take that action card from the discard pile.

name: Ravok
title: The Judicial
abilityWindow: After you win a space combat:
abilityText: You may force your opponent to give you 1 action card from their hand.
unlockCondition: Discard an action card after you win a combat

name: Kaelen
title: The Invincible
abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat that you are participating in:
abilityText: You may purge this card. If you do, roll 1 die for each of your non-fighter ships in this system. For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value, produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign it to 1 of their ships. During this combat, both you and your opponent ignore all of your opponent’s non-warsun unit upgrade technologies.

name: Qekob
title: The Weaver
abilityWindow: Action
abilityText: Choose a system with a player’s command token. That player may remove one of their ships from that system and place it in that player’s home system if it contains no other player’s ships.

name: Zraaqu
title: The Spinner
abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat in a system with your command token:
abilityText: If you are the defender, you may choose up to 2 of your opponent’s units. Those units roll 1 less combat die during the first round of this combat.
unlockCondition: Have 6 of your Command Tokens on the game board

name: Zhossox
title: Spider in Chief
abilityWindow: ACTION
abilityText: Move up to 3 of your Command Tokens on the game board to an adjacent system. Then, purge this card.

name: Catostylus Mosaicus
title: The No Title
abilityWindow: Action
abilityText: Exhaust this card to allow 1 player to either perform the secondary ability of an unchosen strategy card or draw 1 action card.

name: Quinquecirrha
title: The No Title
abilityWindow: When another player activates a system that contains your units
abilityText: You may force them to give you 1 random action card from their hand.
unlockCondition: Have 7 unscored or scored secret objectives.

name: Turritopsis Dohrnii
title: The No Title
abilityWindow: ACTION
abilityText: Place this card faceup near the game board; draw 3 secret objectives. Other players may each draw 1 secret objective. Then, all players play with their secret objectives revealed for the remainder of the game.

name: Noro Weba
title: The Wise
abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat round:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to repair up to 2 ships in the active system.

name: Pospician Meraldo
title: The Judicial
abilityWindow: After you perform a tactical action:
abilityText: You may move 1 of your structures onto a planet you control in the active system.
unlockCondition: Cast more votes than any other player on an agenda

name: Flavius Stellarius
title: The Invincible
abilityWindow: ACTION:
abilityText: ACTION: Gain 1 trade good for each damaged unit on the game board. Then, repair all of your damaged units and choose any number of other players. For each chosen player, repair all of their damaged units that are in or adjacent to a system that contains 1 of your space docks.

name: Valzor
title: The Wise
abilityWindow: At the end of a space combat:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow a player that was participating in that combat to gain 1 command token.

name: Sirok
title: The Judicial
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT:
abilityText: You may use the BOMBARDMENT ability of any of your units in adjacent systems.

name: Dreathos
title: The Invincible
abilityWindow: After another player commits units to a planet you control that is not in another player's home system:
abilityText: You may purge this card to return all committed units to space and place 5 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

name: Gu’la Ma
title: The Wise
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of a player’s units use PRODUCTION:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to apply +1 to the total PRODUCTION value of those units and reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1.

name: Syphrydon Umbas
title: The Judicial
abilityWindow: After you score a secret objective:
abilityText: You may draw 1 secret objective.
unlockCondition: Have 4 carriers on the game board

name: Anima Scrutator
title: The Invincible
abilityWindow: ACTION:
abilityText: Place this card face up in your play area. During the status phase of this round, you may score any number of your unscored status phase secret objectives that you satisfy the requirements for. At the end of the status phase, purge this card.

name: Innovator Zeth
title: The Wise
abilityWindow: ACTION:
abilityText: Exhaust this card to choose a player. That player may move 1 of their ships into an adjacent system that doesn’t contain any other player's ships. If the ship started this action in a system that contains that player's command token, they place a command token from their reinforcements into the target system.

name: Strategist Kreel
title: The Judicial
abilityWindow: When you resolve the primary or secondary ability of the Leadership strategy card:
abilityText: If you gained 1 or more command tokens from spending influence, gain 1 additional command token.
unlockCondition: Resolve the primary ability of a strategy card in 1 of your neighbors' play areas.

name: Grandmaster Xel'Kor
title: The Invincible
abilityWindow: ACTION:
abilityText: For each system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may move 1 ship in that system into an adjacent system that doesn’t contain another player's ships.

name: Echo-Weaver Tzara
title: The Wise
abilityWindow: ACTION:
abilityText: Exhaust this card to place 1 frontier token in a system that does not contain a planet.

name: Chrono-Tactician Xelthar
title: The Judicial
abilityWindow: ACTION:
abilityText: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 mech on a planet you control. When a public objective is revealed, you may place 1 infantry on a planet you control.
unlockCondition: Have 5 infantry that are not in or adjacent to your home system

name: Fatebreaker Azhurak
title: The Invincible
abilityWindow: At the start of your turn:
abilityText: You may purge this card. If you do, during this turn you may perform any number of actions.

name: The Vizier
title: The Wise
abilityWindow: When a player places or produces fighters or destroyers in a system
abilityText: You may exhaust this card. That player may place any number of those units in adjacent systems containing 1 or more of their units.

name: The Synthesist
title: The Judicial
abilityWindow: When you research a non-unit upgrade technology:
abilityText: Gain 1 trade good per planet you control that has a technology specialty of that technology's colour.

name: The Prophet
title: The Invincible
abilityWindow: ACTION:
abilityText: Attach this card to 1 non-home planet on the game board that does not have a technology specialty. This planet is treated as having all four technology specialties. You ignore your SCATTERED LEGIONS faction ability on this planet. If you control that planet, you may place 1 PDS on that planet.

name: Rhino the Adventurer
title: The Wise
abilityWindow: ACTION:
abilityText: Exhaust this card and choose another player. Choose a ship type that has a bounty token on that player’s faction sheet with a cost of 4 or less; the chosen player must choose 1 of their ships of that type in a system that contains 1 of their command tokens, if able. The chosen ship is destroyed and that player gains trade goods equal to its cost.

name: John Perro
title: The Judicial
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of your units make rolls for SPACE CANNON:
abilityText: For each result of 10, before applying modifiers, produce 1 additional hit.
unlockCondition: Have 7 Units that have SPACE CANNON on the game board

name: Monturak Homotol
title: The Invincible
abilityWindow: After you destroy a unit with a bounty token on its unit space during combat:
abilityText: If it was a flagship or War Sun, gain 1 victory point. Otherwise, place all units of that type from your reinforcements in systems that contain 1 or more of your ships. Then, purge this card.
